Class LogSettings

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Data.Configuration
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Data.dll

Configuration settings for the application's logging system. Implements INotifyPropertyChanged to support real-time UI updates.

public class LogSettings : INotifyPropertyChanged
Inheritance
object
LogSettings
Implements
INotifyPropertyChanged
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)

object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Remarks

This class manages all logging-related settings including:

  • Log levels and verbosity
  • File retention policies
  • Output targets (console, file, debug window)
  • Log directory and file management

Settings can be modified at runtime and applied via ApplySettings(), which updates the global logging configuration.

Remarks

Uses custom directory if specified and valid, otherwise falls back to LocalApplicationData\NeonSuit\RSSReader\Logs.

LogDirectory

Custom directory for log files. If empty, default location is used.

public string LogDirectory { get; set; }

Property Value

string

LogLevel

Minimum log level to capture.

public string LogLevel { get; set; }

Property Value

string

One of: Verbose, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Fatal

MaxFileSizeMB

Maximum size per log file in megabytes before rotation.

public int MaxFileSizeMB { get; set; }

Property Value

int

Range: 1-100 MB. Default: 10 MB.

RetentionDays

Number of days to retain log files before automatic cleanup.

public int RetentionDays { get; set; }

Property Value

int

Range: 1-365 days. Default: 7 days.
